Emmett Shear, founder of Twitch, challenges prevailing beliefs in AGI development, critiquing the ‚Äúcontrol and steering‚Äù paradigm. Advocating for ‚Äúorganic alignment,‚Äù he emphasizes the necessity of nurturing AI systems that genuinely care about humans, discussing the implications of viewing AGI as mere tools and offering insights into his progressive approaches at Softmax.

News üì∞Ô∏è
1.)
Top 5 Most Clicked News Articles From Last Week
A.)
9 AI Breakthroughs That Shocked Us at TechCrunch Disrupt
| Matt Wolfe | YouTube.com | November 6, 2025
TechCrunch Disrupt‚Äôs 20th anniversary showcased a remarkable array of AI innovations, from culinary robots to nanotechnology and drone defense systems. Highlighting nine startups that are revolutionizing sectors such as agriculture and coding, this exploration offers a glimpse into the future shaped by artificial intelligence.
B.)
Michael Truell: How Cursor Builds at the Speed of AI
| a16z | YouTube.com | November 10, 2025
Cursor CEO Michael Truell and a16z‚Äôs Martin Casado explore innovative strategies behind the rapid development of one of the fastest-growing developer tools. They delve into the unique design constraints that fueled their focus on power users and the transformative two-day work trial process that prioritizes agency over credentials.
C.)
Bubble or No Bubble, AI Keeps Progressing (ft. Relentless Learning + Introspection)
| AI Explained | YouTube.com | November 10, 2025
Focus remains on pivotal advances in AI, particularly in continual learning, a long-held challenge. Insights into models that introspect themselves and recent achievements in image generation highlight the evolving landscape of artificial intelligence.
D.)
8 Hour AI Agents Course In 30 Minutes (Deep Learning AI)
| Tina Huang | YouTube.com | November 8, 2025
Tina unpacks essential insights on no-code AI agent builders, covering platforms such as StackAI, Relevance AI, and n8n. By the end, viewers will understand which tool best suits their workflow, including automation capabilities and practical applications in various business contexts.
E.)
How to Use ComfyUI (Generate Images on YOUR Computer) for Beginners
| The Neuron | YouTube.com | November 7, 2025
Corey and Grant provide a detailed introduction to using ComfyUI, an innovative node-based interface for AI image generation. This tutorial covers installation, understanding workflows, and generating your first image with Flux, equipping beginners with essential skills and tips for effective image generation.
November 18, 2025 üìÖÔ∏è

4.)
Do You Have A Link In This Issue? Learn How To Track It For Free
| AI-Weekly.ai | November 18, 2025
This article outlines, step-by-step, how you can get free website traffic reporting on any link to your domain (AKA domain name, website or web address) that has been published by AI-Weekly.
November 17, 2025 üìÖÔ∏è
5.)
Emmett Shear on Building AI That Actually Cares: Beyond Control and Steering
| a16z | YouTube.com | November 17, 2025
Emmett Shear, founder of Twitch, challenges prevailing beliefs in AGI development, critiquing the ‚Äúcontrol and steering‚Äù paradigm. Advocating for ‚Äúorganic alignment,‚Äù he emphasizes the necessity of nurturing AI systems that genuinely care about humans, discussing the implications of viewing AGI as mere tools and offering insights into his progressive approaches at Softmax.
6.)
How 48% Of Non-Engineers Are Shipping Production Software (ft. Retool CEO David Hsu)
| The Neuron | YouTube.com | November 17, 2025
Retool CEO David Hsu presents groundbreaking survey data revealing that nearly half of non-engineers are now equipped to create production-grade software. Insights into the shift towards ‚Äúvibe coding,‚Äù the transformation of Excel users into app builders, and the implications for traditional software engineering roles highlight the new era of software development.
7.)
Top 15 New Technology Trends That Will Define 2027
| AI Uncovered | YouTube.com | November 17, 2025
Explore groundbreaking technologies that are set to reshape our lives by 2027, including AI evolution, quantum computing, and advanced biotech. Discover how these advancements will transform communication, healthcare, and daily living, while also raising important questions about privacy and the human experience in a tech-driven world.
8.)
Google Expands Gemini AI Access In Vids Workspace Tool. Enabling More Users To Create Videos With AI
| Blog.google | November 17, 2025
Starting today, we‚Äôre expanding access to a select number of powerful Gemini features in Google Vids, previously only available to paying users, to anyone who has a Gmail account.
9.)
xAI Launches Grok 4.1 For All Users On Grok.com. X. And iOS And Android Apps
| X.ai | November 17, 2025
Grok 4.1 is now available to all users on grok.com, X, and the iOS and Android apps. It is rolling out immediately in Auto mode and can be selected explicitly as ‚ÄúGrok 4.1‚Äù in the model picker.
10.)
Nvidia Unveils Apollo Open AI Models For Scientific Simulation. Adopted By Industry Leaders
| Blogs.nvidia.com | November 17, 2025
Applied Materials, Cadence, LAM Research, Luminary Cloud, KLA, PhysicsX, Rescale, Siemens and Synopsys are among the industry leaders adopting these open models to simulate and accelerate their design processes in automotive, aerospace and other industries.
11.)
Google Launches New Gemini Certifications To Validate Generative AI Skills In Education
| Blog.google | November 17, 2025
We‚Äôre announcing new Gemini certifications for education. Today, we are announcing three new Gemini certifications designed to validate core skills in using Gemini and other Google AI tools that can enhance learning, creativity and productivity. Those who successfully pass the assessment will be awarded a verifiable and easy-to-share digital certificate, which they can use for PD credits or showcase to their broader education community.
12.)
Elevenlabs Launches New AI-Powered Image And Video Generation Tools For Creators And Businesses
| Elevenlabs.io | November 17, 2025
Within ElevenLabs, you can now bring ideas to life in one complete creative workflow. Use leading models like Veo, Sora, Kling, Wan and Seedance to create high-quality visuals, then bring them to life with the best voices, music, and sound effects from ElevenLabs.
13.)
Anthropic Partners With Rwanda And ALX To Expand AI Education For Thousands Of Learners In Africa
| Anthropic.com | November 17, 2025
Anthropic is announcing a new partnership with the Government of Rwanda and African tech training provider ALX to bring Chidi‚Äîa learning companion built on Claude, to hundreds of thousands of learners across Africa. Rwanda‚Äôs ICT & Innovation and Education ministries are deploying Chidi within their national education system, while ALX will bring the tool to students across the continent through their technology training programs.
14.)
OpenAI Named Emerging Leader In Generative AI By Gartner In 2025 Innovation Guide
| OpenAI.com | November 17, 2025
Gartner recognizes OpenAI as an Emerging Leader in the 2025 Gartner Innovation Guide for Generative AI Model Providers. We believe this reflects our progress in supporting over 1 million companies deploy AI safely and at scale.
15.)
Jeff Bezos Named Co-CEO Of AI Startup Project Prometheus. Joins To Lead New Funding And Growth Efforts
| TheVerge.com | November 17, 2025
It will use artificial intelligence to improve manufacturing for computers, cars, and spacecraft.
16.)
Google Launches New AI Tools In Search To Help Users Plan Trips. Find Flight Deals And Book Reservations
| Blog.google | November 17, 2025
With new AI-powered features in Search, you can get help building the perfect itinerary, finding a great deal on your next trip and turning your plans into bookings.
17.)
Google Launches Weathernext 2 AI Model For More Accurate And Efficient Global Weather Forecasting
| Blog.google | November 17, 2025
The new AI model delivers more efficient, more accurate and higher-resolution global weather predictions.
18.)
Levi Strauss Partners With Microsoft To Create Next-Generation Superagent For Digital Innovation
| News.microsoft.com | November 17, 2025
Microsoft Corp. and Levi Strauss & Co. are spotlighting their shared vision for the future of retail, powered by AI and cloud innovation. This collaboration underscores LS&Co.‚Äôs commitment to using Microsoft technologies to drive enriched and improved consumer experiences across the globe while also increasing productivity with corporate employees.
19.)
Google Invests $2.25M To Launch AI-Ready Data Commons And Boost Data Infrastructure In Africa
| Blog.google | November 17, 2025
Public data is essential for solving major challenges, and for Africa, it‚Äôs the fuel for an AI-driven future. To help realize this potential, Google is committing $2.25 million to help modernize the continent‚Äôs public data systems, making them accessible and ready for the AI age.
November 16, 2025 üìÖÔ∏è
20.)
Almost Timely News: Cultivating An AI Mindset, Part 2
| Chris Penn | YouTube.com | November 16, 2025
Christopher Penn reveals techniques for effectively utilizing AI in project management and data analysis. Learn how to simplify complex tasks for AI, address common errors, and leverage existing tools to unlock your company‚Äôs data efficiently.
21.)
First Recorded Major Hack Using AI‚Ä¶
| Matt Berman | YouTube.com | November 16, 2025
A groundbreaking incident marks the intersection of artificial intelligence and cybersecurity, revealing the intricate tactics employed by cybercriminals. This event challenges existing paradigms, urging organizations to reconsider their defenses against evolving AI-driven threats.
November 15, 2025 üìÖÔ∏è
22.)
Top 15 Breakthrough Discoveries That Will Change Everything Soon
| AI Uncovered | YouTube.com | November 15, 2025
Explore groundbreaking advancements in various fields that are poised to reshape society, technology, and medicine in the near future. From quantum computing to neuroscience, these discoveries challenge conventional thinking and highlight innovations that could redefine human existence and our daily lives.
23.)
Microsoft CEO Discusses Empowering Companies To Build Value In The AI Platform Era
| Linkedin.com | November 15, 2025
I‚Äôve been thinking a lot about what the net benefit of the AI platform wave is. The real question is how to empower every company out there to get more out of this platform shift and build their own AI native capabilities and enterprise value (vs inadvertently just transfer their unique value to the tech sector!!).
24.)
Elon Musk‚Äôs Grok-5 AI Leak. 6 Trillion Parameters. Multimodal Features Surpass Grok-4
| Reddit.com | November 15, 2025
Leaks on Grok-5 by Elon Musk: 6 trillion parameter model, much higher intelligence density per gigabyte than Grok 4, multimodal, text, pictures, video, audio. ‚Äúit‚Äôs really going to feel sentient.‚Äù
25.)
Jack Dorsey Backs Divine Vine Reboot. Focusing On Core Content And Rejecting AI-Driven Features
| TechTimes.com | November 15, 2025
The return of Vine is here with the new platform called diVine. This reboot has gone live with the beta version of the platform and has received significant backing from none other than Jack Dorsey.
November 14, 2025 üìÖÔ∏è
26.)
Accelerating Private Equity Deal Flows With Claude
| YouTube.com | November 14, 2025
Claude streamlines the investment banking and private equity workflow by generating client-ready teasers from Egnyte financials and screening deals against criteria in SharePoint. The demonstration highlights Claude‚Äôs ability to uncover hidden risks, conduct stress tests, and efficiently produce investment committee materials, transforming tedious tasks into rapid, comprehensive analysis.
27.)
ChatGPT Atlas And The Next Era Of Web Browsing ‚Äî The OpenAI Podcast Ep. 9
| OpenAI | YouTube.com | November 14, 2025
Ben Goodger and Darin Fisher share insights from their experiences in developing ChatGPT Atlas, unveiling how AI is evolving web browsing. They discuss innovative features like communicative tabs and agent-driven task management, outlining the impactful decisions guiding the future of internet navigation.
28.)
Claude Code Modernizes A Legacy COBOL Codebase
| Anthropic | YouTube.com | November 14, 2025
Claude Code showcases its capabilities by modernizing legacy COBOL applications, transforming complex mainframe code into streamlined Java solutions. Leveraging advanced analysis of business logic and data flows, it facilitates migration while maintaining essential functionality and automating documentation and testing processes.
29.)
From Pilot To Practice: How BBVA Is Scaling AI Across The Organization
| OpenAI | YouTube.com | November 14, 2025
Antonio Bravo and Elena Alfaro share insights on BBVA‚Äôs ambitious efforts to implement and scale artificial intelligence across its various teams and business units. Their discussion highlights strategic initiatives that are transforming how the organization leverages data-driven technologies on a global scale.
30.)
Generating Real-Time Credit Intelligence With Claude
| Anthropic | YouTube.com | November 14, 2025
Claude showcases its ability to generate credit intelligence quickly, pulling together data from various sources to analyze Walmart‚Äôs 2030 bonds. The demo illustrates how market signals translate into well-supported investment decisions, linking expert insights and earnings transcripts seamlessly within a tight timeframe.
31.)
New ChatGPT Is Severely Underrated & More AI Use Cases
| The AI Advantage | YouTube.com | November 14, 2025
Igor provides an insightful overview of the latest AI innovations, including the unexpected launch of OpenAI‚Äôs GPT-5.1 series. He evaluates how the new ChatGPT measures up against leading competitors and explores transformative tools like an AI-powered image editor and the Kimi K2 Thinking model.
32.)
How Philips Is Scaling AI Literacy Across 70,000 Employees
| OpenAI | YouTube.com | November 14, 2025
Philips is spearheading an initiative to enhance AI literacy by integrating it into the fabric of its organization. This extensive training program encompasses executive education, practical use case challenges, and the implementation of ChatGPT Enterprise for over 70,000 employees, fostering a robust environment for AI understanding and application.
33.)
How to Make AI Models Sound Exactly Like You (Fine-Tune Tutorial)
| Matt Wolfe | YouTube.com | November 14, 2025
Learn how to fine-tune a language model to reflect your own voice by using accessible tools and methods. This tutorial covers the entire process from data collection to implementation, providing practical insights for content creators looking to leverage AI technology without needing advanced technical skills.
34.)
Is GPT-5.1 Really an Upgrade? But Models Can Auto-Hack Govts, So ‚Ä¶ There‚Äôs That
| AI Explained | YouTube.com | November 14, 2025
Recent releases unveil significant advancements and concerns surrounding GPT-5.1, including noted regressions and implications for AI capabilities in government hacking. The discussion delves into the functionalities of Claude‚Äôs auto-hacking, the launch of SIMA 2, and innovations in AI-generated music.
35.)
Notion‚Äôs Rebuild For Agentic AI: How GPT-5 Helped Unlock Autonomous Workflows
| OpenAI | YouTube.com | November 14, 2025
OpenAI‚Äôs partnership with Notion leverages the capabilities of GPT-5, delivering significant enhancements to workflow automation in their AI-powered workspace. This strategic integration transforms how millions of users engage with tasks such as writing, summarizing, and Q&A, reshaping productivity in innovative ways.
36.)
OpenAI Surprise Drops GPT-5.1 But Google Is Lurking
| AI For Humans | YouTube.com | November 14, 2025
OpenAI has unveiled GPT-5.1, showcasing enhancements in vision and new ChatGPT personalities with a focus on maintaining positive vibes. Additionally, news surfaces about Google‚Äôs promising Nanobanana 2 and Gemini 3 Pro, while various updates in AI, including AI-generated music topping country charts and Disney‚Äôs acceptance of AI content, highlight the evolving landscape of artificial intelligence.
37.)
Japanese Woman Marries Digital Persona Created In ChatGPT. Holds AR Wedding Ceremony With AI Partner
| Reddit.com | November 14, 2025
A 32 year old woman in Japan just married a digital persona she built inside ChatGPT. Calling him ‚ÄúLune Klaus,‚Äù a ceremony was held in Okayama using AR glasses to project his presence.
38.)
AWS Unveils AI Meeting Simulator To Train Workers For High-Stress Job Interviews And Scenarios
| TechRadar.com | November 14, 2025
AWS launches AI meeting simulator to provide practical, life-like experience. Participants can get instant feedback on hor they performed.
AWS is also offering a broad range of AI training courses to boost learning.
39.)
Google Unveils SRL Framework To Boost Small AI Models‚Äô Complex Reasoning And Reliability
| VentureBeat.com | November 14, 2025
Researchers at Google Cloud and UCLA have proposed a new reinforcement learning framework that significantly improves the ability of language models to learn very challenging multi-step reasoning tasks. Supervised Reinforcement Learning (SRL) reformulates problem-solving as a sequence of logical ‚Äúactions,‚Äù providing rich learning signals during the training process.
40.)
Aalto University Achieves Single-Shot Optical Tensor Computing. Advancing Ultra-Fast AI Hardware
| Techxplore.com | November 14, 2025
Researchers at Aalto University have demonstrated single-shot tensor computing at the speed of light, a remarkable step towards next-generation artificial general intelligence hardware powered by optical computation rather than electronics.
41.)
Fireflies CEO Responds After Co-Founder Admits To Faking AI Transcriptions With Manual Labor
| Inc.com | November 14, 2025
The AI transcription company is walking back its CTO‚Äôs viral LinkedIn claims that its co-founders hand-transcribed customers‚Äô notes during its early days.
42.)
NotebookLM Introduces Image-Based Information Synthesis To Generate Accurate Outputs
| X.com | November 14, 2025
We spent all night wondering what you were ‚Äúactually‚Äù waiting for, and we finally have it: Images as sources! Whether it‚Äôs a photo of handwritten notes, a screenshot of a textbook or graphs on a web page, NotebookLM can synthesize the information and produce outputs from it.
43.)
OpenAI Partners With Irish Government And Startups To Launch AI Program For Smes And Youth In Ireland
| OpenAI.com | November 14, 2025
Today we are launching ‚ÄòOpenAI for Ireland‚Äô, a new initiative from OpenAI working with the Irish Government, Dogpatch Labs and Patch to help Irish SMEs and founders seize the opportunity of AI to grow, innovate and build for the future.
44.)
Microsoft To Unveil Latest AI Innovations At Ignite 2025 Event On November 18
| News.microsoft.com | November 14, 2025
Join us at 8 a.m. PT on Tuesday, Nov. 18, to learn about how Microsoft is providing the most complete AI story in the marketplace, empowering customers to become Frontier.
45.)
Mindon‚Äôs Unitree G1 Robot Debuts As Autonomous Housekeeper
| X.com | November 14, 2025
Chinese startup MindOn trained Unitree G1 to do house chores. ‚ÄúNo speed up, no teleoperation.‚Äù
November 13, 2025 üìÖÔ∏è
46.)
Controllable World Models Are Here
| Matt Berman | YouTube.com | November 13, 2025
Explore the cutting-edge advancements in controllable world models, transforming the landscape of artificial intelligence and modeling. Insights include real-world applications and implications that showcase the future of AI-driven technologies.
47.)
GPT-5.1 Is Here! (Major Update)
| Matt Berman | YouTube.com | November 13, 2025
A significant update has been rolled out with the launch of GPT-5.1 in Box AI. Users can explore the enhanced capabilities and features that promise to transform AI interactions.
48.)
Massive World Model Release & AI Agent Action! Marble & Google‚Äôs SIMA 2!
| Theoretically Media | YouTube.com | November 13, 2025
Explore groundbreaking innovations in generative AI with a hands-on analysis of World Labs‚Äô Marble and Google DeepMind‚Äôs SimA-2 research. Discover how Marble provides the tools to create dynamic virtual sets and learn about the advancements in agent learning within generated worlds.
49.)
Linkedin Launches AI-Powered People Search. Letting Users Find Profiles With Simple Descriptions
| TheVerge.com | November 13, 2025
You‚Äôre no longer limited to searching for people based on their name, company, or job title.
50.)
Mozilla Unveils User-Focused AI Features For Firefox. Invites Community Input On Development
| Blog.mozilla.org | November 13, 2025
We recently shared how we are approaching AI in Firefox, with user choice and openness as our guiding principles. That‚Äôs because we believe AI should be built like the internet, open, accessible, and driven by choice, so that users and the developers helping to build it can use it as they wish, help shape it and truly benefit from it.
51.)
Perplexity Launches GPT-5.1 For Pro And Max Subscribers
| X.com | November 13, 2025
GPT-5.1 is now available for Perplexity Pro and Max subscribers.
52.)
Google Deepmind Unveils Sima 2. A Gemini-Powered AI Agent For Reasoning And Learning In 3D Worlds
| Deepmind.google | November 13, 2025
Last year, we introduced SIMA (Scalable Instructable Multiworld Agent), a generalist AI that could follow basic instructions across a wide range of virtual environments. SIMA was a crucial first step in teaching AI to translate language into meaningful action in rich, 3D worlds.
53.)
Microsoft Unveils Next Phase Of Aurora AI For Advanced Weather And Climate Forecasting Collaboration
| Blogs.microsoft.com | November 13, 2025
Around the world, the dangers of extreme weather are a daily reality. In 2024, extreme weather displaced or disrupted the lives of more than 800,000 people worldwide, a reminder that accurate, timely forecasts aren‚Äôt just about data; they‚Äôre about people. From farmers deciding when to plant to coastal communities preparing for hurricanes, better forecasting can save lives, protect infrastructure, and support economies.
54.)
Google NotebookLM Debuts Deep Research And Adds Support For Word. Pdf. And Sheets File Types
| Blog.google | November 13, 2025
The latest NotebookLM update introduces Deep Research, helping users add diverse, high-quality sources and broadens the types of content you can analyze, including sheets and Word docs.
55.)
Hugging Face Partners With Google Cloud To Advance Open Source AI And Open Science Initiatives
| Huggingface.co | November 13, 2025
Today, we are happy to announce a new and deeper partnership with Google Cloud, to enable companies to build their own AI with open models.
56.)
Google Partners With Golden Goose To Power AI-Driven Sneaker Personalization In Global Stores
| Blog.google | November 13, 2025
Advances in AI have opened up the possibilities for greater personalisation in the fashion world. Exploring this intersection between technology and high fashion, we‚Äôre partnering with Golden Goose, the renowned Italian brand celebrated for its commitment to individuality, on a stylish new collaboration.
57.)
Weibo AI Open-Sources Vibethinker-1.5b. A $7,800 Model Rivaling Larger Llms In Math And Reasoning
| Huggingface.co | November 13, 2025
VibeThinker-1.5B is a 1.5-billion parameter dense language model. With a total training cost of only $7,800 USD, it achieves reasoning performance comparable to larger models like GPT OSS-20B Medium.
58.)
Deepmind. Meta. And Fei-Fei Li Pursue Different Paths In Developing AI World Models
| EntropyTown.com | November 13, 2025
AI has finally reached the ‚Äúwe need to model the whole world‚Äù phase. In the same season, Fei-Fei Li‚Äôs World Labs shipped Marble, a ‚Äúmultimodal world model‚Äù that turns prompts into walkable 3D scenes in your browser; DeepMind announced SIMA 2, an embodied agent that plays, reasons and learns with you inside virtual 3D worlds; and reports emerged that Meta‚Äôs chief AI scientist Yann LeCun is leaving to build a world-model startup of his own. DeepMind, meanwhile, is also calling its interactive video engine Genie 3 a world model.
59.)
Anthropic Reports Disruption Of First Documented AI-Orchestrated Cyber Espionage Campaign
| Anthropic.com | November 13, 2025
We recently argued that an inflection point had been reached in cybersecurity: a point at which AI models had become genuinely useful for cybersecurity operations, both for good and for ill. This was based on systematic evaluations showing cyber capabilities doubling in six months; we‚Äôd also been tracking real-world cyberattacks, observing how malicious actors were using AI capabilities. While we predicted these capabilities would continue to evolve, what has stood out to us is how quickly they have done so at scale.
60.)
Maryland Partners With Anthropic To Enhance State Services Using Reliable AI Systems
| Anthropic.com | November 13, 2025
The state of Maryland has announced it will use Anthropic‚Äôs advanced AI models to improve government operations and better serve its more than six million residents. Under the new partnership, the state will deploy Claude across multiple state agencies to address several priorities.
61.)
OpenAI Advances Neural Network Interpretability With Models Using Sparse. More Understandable Circuits
| OpenAI.com | November 13, 2025
Neural networks power today‚Äôs most capable AI systems, but they remain difficult to understand. We don‚Äôt write these models with explicit, step-by-step instructions. Instead, they learn by adjusting billions of internal connections, or ‚Äúweights,‚Äù until they master a task. We design the rules of training, but not the specific behaviors that emerge, and the result is a dense web of connections that no human can easily decipher.
62.)
OpenAI Pilots Group Chats In ChatGPT. Enabling Real-Time Collaboration Within Shared Conversations
| OpenAI.com | November 13, 2025
Collaborate with others, and ChatGPT, in the same conversation.
63.)
OpenAI Releases GPT-5.1 API With Faster Reasoning. Better Coding. And New Developer Tools
| OpenAI.com | November 13, 2025
Today we‚Äôre releasing GPT-5.1 in the API platform, the next model in the GPT-5 series that balances intelligence and speed for a wide range of agentic and coding tasks. GPT-5.1 dynamically adapts how much time it spends thinking based on the complexity of the task, making the model significantly faster and more token-efficient on simpler everyday tasks. The model also features a ‚Äúno reasoning‚Äù mode to respond faster on tasks that don‚Äôt require deep thinking, while maintaining the frontier intelligence of GPT-5.1.
64.)
NotebookLM Unveils Custom Video Overview Styles With Prompt-Based Customization
| X.com | November 13, 2025
Finally, the moment you‚Äôve all been waiting for. Rolling out today, you can now create your own custom video overview styles by typing in a prompt in the customization box. Drop your favorite examples below (our expectations are SKY HIGH).
November 12, 2025 üìÖÔ∏è
65.)
Is This The End? (AI Bubble)
| Matt Berman | YouTube.com | November 12, 2025
The constant evolution of artificial intelligence prompts critical questions about its impact on the economy and the tech industry. Insights from leading experts reveal potential challenges and paradigm shifts, while highlighting opportunities for innovation and investment in the AI landscape.
66.)
Satya Nadella ‚Äì How Microsoft Thinks About AGI
| Dwarkesh Patel | YouTube.com | November 12, 2025
In an exclusive interview, Satya Nadella shares insights into Microsoft‚Äôs groundbreaking Fairwater 2 datacenter, equipped with advanced technology to drive AGI development. He delves into the company‚Äôs strategic approach toward AGI and how it plans to leverage its capabilities across various sectors.
67.)
Top 11 New Discoveries In Quantum Computing
| AI Uncovered | YouTube.com | November 12, 2025
Recent advancements in quantum computing reveal unprecedented breakthroughs that could revolutionize technology and science. Key developments such as stable qubits, quantum error correction, and advancements in quantum entanglement are paving the way for a new era of computing, challenging the limits of traditional supercomputers.
68.)
What‚Äôs Really Powering AI (Nobody Talks About This)
| The Next Wave | YouTube.com | November 12, 2025
Evan Conrad, CEO of SF Compute, joins Nathan Lands to unveil the intricate infrastructure fueling today‚Äôs AI applications. The conversation delves into GPU economics, geopolitical influences on AI development, and innovative market solutions that could redefine the future of AI computing.
